urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text:
@sid_vmw Have you lodged a report with the Lost & Found office? You will be issued a file reference which is used to track the status of your baggage via the tracing link below:

https://t.co/LmalEN0zco

@Fero20005 @ShivV29929870 Hi Fero, I am deeply sorry to learn about the bad experience you had with your baggage. 
Unfortunately, since you are already in contact with Customer Feedback Service, there is not much I can do for you.

data.text: @tomdotquitter @KakraBlankson @Zobaczysz1 Hi Tom, I am not certain if further action can be taken since I am not aware of the detailed background of your case. If you want, you can give me your booking reference via private message, and I will see if there is anything I can do. Kind regards, Yolanda

urls.title: Book tickets online now and fly out into the world
urls.description: Book tickets online now and fly out into the world. ✈ From check-in to disembarking - we place the highest value on hygiene and your health.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text:
@ShivV29929870 @Fero20005 Hi Shiv, in order to receive compensation, you need to file an official complaint on https://t.co/pRnXTIMRTH. This is the link to the compensation form: https://t.co/a4ORjJC8UC.
Kind regards, Yolanda
